author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Would it be better to include this pretty-printing in their respective packages instead of doing it via type-piracy like this?

@fredrikekre Yes, it would be better and I hope much of it can be migrated eventually. However, beauty is in the eye of the beholder, and I doubt everything we need at Quantum-Factory can be migrated. This package is meant to provide easy access to "the rest that can't be migrated" to anyone else who finds it preferable.
